After an introduction by Colin Powell and NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell , the film features several NFL players giving readings from the Declaration of Independence. Dancz's score, titled "Declaration Anthem," plays throughout. You get chills thinking about how many people are going to be watching, said Dancz, who wrote the score in collaboration with a former student, Ben Leathers.
